name: the android apocalypse
description:
okay so download all the files and put them in a folder together but only run the .exe

A text based game made in small basic about a dystopian present where androids have fallen and are killing everyone you are the main character in this dark adventure

if you want to submit ideas or give feedback my email is heyitzjustluke@gmail.com

just remember to keep an eye on your ammo dont trust h̸̸i̷͘̕m̀͡,̀͞ ̶̸̢͝t̡͠h͏̵e҉̸ ̨͜k͢͝i̡̧͏̶͞l̷҉l҉̸́͜ȩ͞҉̷̀r̴̸̛҉.̴̡͞
